reviews.sentence: Relaxing. Peaceful placevery good service.

Great remote spa hotel with huge beautiful rooms in a picturesque location. We really enjoyed our time at the Rio Douro hotel and Spa. The location is very remote but is perfect if you meant for a relaxing spa vacation. We went with two small children and were very pleased to have them enjoy the expansive lobby and childrens area within it. The staff were very helpful the room was huge modern and clean. The grounds surrounding the hotel are beautiful we were hoping to be able to enjoy a hike or small nature walk around the property but there was none. It was not a big deal because our days were filled with touring vineyards and enjoying the surrounding roman ruins.

Great hotel to relax and unwind in comfort. It is without doubt a great hotel. We recommend it to those wanting to escape the city and unwind. We came without a car by taxi from Porto which meant we were constrained mostly to the hotel but they have great facilities to keep you occupied gym indoor and outdoor pool spa etc and there are a number of fun and interesting day trips activities that can be arranged at fairly decent prices. The reception staff are extremely helpful and attentive and the food for the most part is good if you have a sweet tooth the desserts are really fantastic. There is also a great wine selection as you might expect in this regionThe rooms are super comfy. Ours had a fantastic panoramic view of the river. All in all we happily spent 3 days here doing nothing but relaxingAlthough the hotel was very clean our room was not cleaned one day. it seems the cleaners come around at a fixed time each day and if you happen to be in your room at the time they do not come back again later. The food in the restaurant is decent but quite pricey for Portuguese standards and given the lack of any other restaurants shops within easy reach it would be nice to have more choice and variety or daily specials after 3 days we ran out of things we wanted to eat. Lunchtime food service was also very slow as it seems they have very few staff on hand during the day.

Excellent. Beautiful hotel in the Douro area but also quite close to Porto. Great spacious rooms with great views a beautiful pool and very good restaurant. Breakfast buffet is delicious with lots of choice and staff is very friendly and helpful. Pool area was quite small so it could get quite crowded.

Perfect Stay. Beautiful hotel amazing views from the room. The staff were fantastic very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was the best I had in a very long time. very well presented and delicious options. It was a fantastic experience we will definitely go back. Nothing.

Exceptional. All staff breakfast restaurant and bar very nice river view good room. One comment. It is fantastic to walk along river. But pathes are not convenient for walkers. But of course this question depends on Portugal state authorities.
Newly reopened. Wonderful setting nice pool. Very helpful staff fantastic breakfast amazing comfortable beds.
Excellent. The location is really beautiful. The food and drinks are great and the staff is very caring. The rooms are also very cosy and have a great view.
Expensive for an overnighter but if staying longer perhaps value to use all facilities. The view from therom. The snack purchased at the bar near reception. Bread was soggy.
Great service great people great hotel.
Excellent. Very nice view and very modern. We had no towels on our room and we had to call the reception four times to get some. Service with exception of restaurant was not good overall.

Exceptional. The facilities are amazing the hotel staff is also very thoughtful young and vibrant. it is the ideal place if you want to relax with an amazing view. I totally recommend the restaurants the food is very good with a mix of the old and the new of the portuguese cuisine. We had an issue with our car battery and the hotel was not able to support us with some kind of assistance they were very helpful though. But due to the location of the hotel if would be nice if they would have some kind of initial service.

Great Hotel bad service. The hotel is set in a truly beautiful location overlooking the Douro valley. The hotel is brand new therefore is clean and has great facilities namely the indoor pool and spa area. The views from the room are wonderful but unfortunately that ’s where the good stopsThe service in the hotel was unfortunately well below the standards of a 4 star hotel. Extremely long waits for a drinks up to an hour and very junior staff managing the hotel. When we initially checked in we were urged to book a reservation at the hotel as it was so busy. Much to our surprise we arrived at an almost empty restaurant that night. It was n’t until we were served the food that we really understood why it was empty. It was possibly some of the worst food I have eaten at a hotel let alone a 4 star hotel. Undercoked and completely flavorless we were forced to return to our room and order room service. We spent the rest of our stay eating at the reception cafe which was mainly pizzas and burgers but much better than the restaurant. The spa was also equally underwhelming. We paid for a 1 hour massage that felt rushed and once again conducted by under qualified staff. As with a standard massage they did n’t enquire about pressure or ask if there were any areas we would like them to focus on it was more of a vigorous rub down an expensive one at that. Finally checking out was also an issue when they insisted I did n’t pay for my stay despite having an invoice from the hotel that had told me I had paid. It took me showing my credit card statements before I was “ free to go ”. It could truly be a wonderful stay if they just improved service and got some more experienced staff.

Exceptional. Everything was perfect or nearly there. The staff were all very helpful and joyous from the front desk to the restaurant bars spa and cleaning staff. Having whatsap concierge service was a highlight requesting support in our room ordering room service and booking the restaurant everything was easy and seamless. The facilities are both clean and beautiful the architect has done a specially good job given the elevation changes across the hotel. Many photo opportunities throughout our stay. Having 24 hour open pools 2 outside and 1 inside and gym was great we took full advantage of that as well. We stayed in a room with both balcony and terrace which was simply amazing very comfortable and functional. There are a few details in the room that will surprise you. Ah the grill service at the rooftop bar was delicious. The lady there was both an excellent cook and a fantastic host. She made sure we had everything prefect. One of the highlights of the stay as well. A very well managed and staffed hotel that makes a priority out of delighting their guests. we will definitely be back. CongratulationsThese are really small details but we feel we should mention anyway to improve the experience even more. During breakfast we feel that they may be understaffed a little as we noticed delays in replenishing scrambled eggs and in serving espressos. At dinner we agreed that the food was good but not great example the risotto was not very creamyOne of the times we ordered room service it took nearly 40 minutes for the food just toasts to arrive.

Wonderful. Beautiful place with great amenitiesHelpful and friendly stafNice clean room with adequate amount of space. Due to the amount of guests sometimes getting the staff attention took a bit too long particularly in the bar.

An outstanding experience. Hope to be back. Breakfast was great and the view outstanding. Miguel met us on arrival and took the time to explain everything and show us around as well. Room service was a bit late one of the days.

Wonderful. Beautiful and stylish interiorVery helpful staff at the reception Nice wine selection good restaurant Amazing viewsLovely and relaxing. Quite far from Douro valley vineyards — at least 15 h of driveAvoid laundry — the clothes returned late dirty and wet Spa is average the staff does n’t speak English If takes 3 calls and 40 minutes of wait to get some still water in the room. but sometimes they just rush into you room with out even a knock to ask “ is everything ok ”.

Gorgeous setting on the river hotel is difficult to find no signing from main roads. Beautiful setting on the river minimalist decor interesting modern building. Nice staff on reception. Pleasant cleaner. Hotel itself is very nice. With the exception of one pleasant young man a law student the restaurant staff in the evening were not very friendly and service was slow. Food was disappointing also. Breakfast was just ok the cooked food was lukewarm. The breakfast staff were friendlier.
